name: Sigilian
description: The Sigilian is a Medium Construct with the ability to manipulate books and harness magical energies. It has a spectral appearance and can move through spaces as narrow as 1 inch.
memorable: The Sigilian can restore its health by removing words from pages, making it a unique challenge.
goals: It seeks to absorb magical energies and maintain its vitality.
relations: Often encountered in libraries or places of magical knowledge, may be linked to spellcasters or guardians of tomes.
environment: Typically found in libraries, archives, or places rich in magical lore.
strengths: Resilient to many forms of damage, immune to poison, and can regain health through abilities.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to psychic damage and physically weak, limiting its direct combat abilities.
attacks: Utilizes Cut to deal slashing damage and copy attacks, and Paste to adapt damage type based on previous attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Devour Spell allows it to consume spells from spellbooks, amplifying its damage or restoring health.
skills: Skilled in stealth, making it adept at sneaking.
additional_information: Can enter books carried by others, creating unique evasion tactics.
Immune to several conditions like blinded, charmed, and frightened.
Can only consume one spell at a time, requiring strategic planning.
Possesses Amorphous ability, enhancing its mobility.
Absorbs energy from spellbooks, making it a threat in magical situations.
test_queries: stealthy creature that heals with books
resilient construct vulnerable to psychic damage
